snippet.title: Amber Heard Opens Up On Johnny Depp Casting In Fantastic Beasts | News Flash | Entertainment Weekly
snippet.description:
Now it’s Amber Heard’s turn. In the wake of a frenzy of debate about ex-husband Johnny Depp’s role in the Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, the actress has posted a statement of her own. Heard’s Instagram message posted Thursday is largely a reprint of the statement Heard and Depp jointly issued as part of their divorce settlement one year ago.
